titleStmt.title: The royal and happy poverty or, a meditation on the felicities of an innocent and happy poverty: grounded on the fifth of Matthew, the third verse. And addressed to the late and present sufferers of the times.
titleStmt.author: Sprigg, William, fl. 1657.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Giles Calvert, at the Black-spread Eagle, at the west end of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: With advertisements and errata bound at end.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
